text: Polycera janjukia is a species of sea slug, a nudibranch, a shell-less marine gastropod mollusc in the family Polyceridae.Bouchet, P. (2015). Polycera janjukia. In: MolluscaBase (2015). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species on 2017-01-09. == Distribution == This species was described from Victoria, Australia. It also occurs in New South Wales and Tasmania.Rudman, W.B., 2000 (April 17) Polycera janjukia Burn, 1962. [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== Category:Polyceridae Category:Gastropods described in 1962
title: Polycera janjukia
